page.title: 10Industry in Barrhead
page.content: Most of the{industry}in the area is light engineering. We are not in an area of tourism, so very few people work in service industries. The name of{Armitage Shanks}is recognised world wide. They manufacture a wide a range of pottery and plastic bathroom appliances. { Yorkshire Imperial Metals manufacture copper tubes which find their way into almost every industry and home in the country in central heating systems and sanitary fittings. { Scottish Animal Products}is one of the largest producers of pet foods in the country. Food for cats and dogs is prepared and canned in their modern factory in Barrhead.
